item.title: Folk playlist for 12/2014
item.description: Including: Ain'T No Grave, Alasdair Roberts, Arthur Mcbride, Don Mclean, Fairport Convention, Fleet Foxes, Nick Drake, Oscar Isaac, Phil Ochs, Townes Van Zandt.

item.title: Folk playlist for 11/2014
item.description: Including: Alice'S Restaurant, Dave Rawlings Machine, Franco Morone, Frank Turner, Laura Marling, Sandy Denny, Shakey Graves, Spiers & Boden, Stan Rogers, Townes Van Zandt.

item.title: Folk playlist for 10/2014
item.description: Including: Anaconda, Dave Van Ronk, Dick Gaughan, In Spite Of Ourselves, Inside Llewyn Davis, My Silver Lining, Paul Brady, The Decemberists, The Dodos, The Wood Brothers.

item.title: Folk playlist for 9/2014
item.description: Including: Caved Crow, Corb Lund, Dave Van Ronk, Jim Croce, Laura Marling, Nothing In This World, Ryan Adams, The Decemberists, Uncle Tupelo, Ó Mín Flaskan Fríða.

item.title: Folk playlist for 8/2014
item.description: Including: Beirut, Ben Howard, Elizabeth Cotten, Gillian Welch, Iron And Wine, Jim Croce, Montage, Neil Young, Nick Drake, The Avett Brothers.

item.title: Folk playlist for 7/2014
item.description: Including: Beirut, Billy Bragg, Chuck Ragan, Joan Baez, Mark Knopfler, Neil Young, Nick Drake, Pete Seeger, Willie Watson, Ансамбль "Белое Злато".

item.title: Folk playlist for 6/2014
item.description: Including: "Mexican Cowboy", Cat Stevens, Hurray For The Riff Raff, Joan Baez, Kate Rusby, Langhorne Slim, Nick Drake, Pale Blue Eyes, Pete Seeger, Sam Brookes.

item.title: Folk playlist for 5/2014
item.description: Including: Ashamed, Blitzen Trapper, Dick Gaughan, Donovan, E. Watson, I Won'T Be Found, Joe Pug, The Devil Makes Three, Tim Buckley, Tom Waits.

item.title: Folk playlist for 4/2014
item.description: Including: Atlantic City, Candle Kid, Dock Boggs, Jim Croce, John Prine, Johnny Flynn, Neil Young, Roscoe Holcomb, The Milk Carton Kids, Willie Watson.

item.title: Folk playlist for 3/2014
item.description: Including: Ben Caplan, Gordon Lightfoot, Gregory Alan Isakov, Jim Croce, Little Wings + Feist Duet, Ramblin' Jack Elliott, Shovels &Amp; Rope, Stan Rogers, The Mountain Goats, The Wailin' Jennys.
